title: Wall Street Breakfast June 18: Key Moment In Crypto History
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: Facebook has unveiled a consortium to create an open-source digital currency, Mario Draghi is ready to launch another round of stimulus, and Boeing did not announce a single new order on the first day of the Paris Air Show. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
